channel.title: [508] DavidScape 508 V7.0 ~MOST POPULAR BULBY SOURCE~ 508 Coding Tutor Included!
channel.description:
[center][size=20pt][u][b]~DavidScape 508~ The Most Popular Bulby Base Around[/b][/u][/size]
Well it's finally here! I have to clean out my Inbox at least twice a week just with people asking me to release DavidScape again. Some people saw my development topic, and it now leads here, so lets get down to business! [/center]
[b]To start off this thread, let me give you some of the basics that the Bulby base had to offer: (Not including things that Palidino added)[/b]
~All twenty-four skills, this was huge, and the main thing about Bulby base that people liked ~Commands ~Nice shops ~New Home ~A few nice minigames ~Basic Command-Based clan chat ~A lot more that the inexperienced coder wouldn't appreciate, so I wont mention them
[b]Now let me tell you the things that I added in versions V1.1-V6.0[/b] [color=green] ~Edited many skills:
[ul][li]Fletching: Made it actually give arrows[/li] [li]All supply based skills (WC, Mining, ect): Added things to prevent cheating[/li] [li]RuneCrafting completely re-done[/li] [li]More summoning creatures, Steel Titan you can attack[/li] [li]Max Skill level is 136, max combat level 174[/li] [li]Ranging: Arrows actually drop to floor[/li][/ul]
~New shop interfaces ~MANY Commands ~God Wars Dungeon ~Player Verification Codes ~Real Clan Chat ~Grand Exchange (first in a 508 source) ~Staff Zone ~Much Better PVP ~Fixed Mutes, Bans, and other punishments ~More NPC's and NPC drops ~Quest Tab Teleports ~Random Event (used to stop macro'ers) ~Donator Benefits ~Many things that I can't think of. As I go along I will add them to this list.
[b]Things added in V7.0[/b]
~Edit Shops ~Moved home ~Barbarian Assault (first real one in [u]ANY[/u] RuneScape private server I can think of) ~Barrows ~Removed Grand Exchange (Not worth the resources and lagg) ~Added more Mod powers ~More NPC's and NPC drops ~MUCH more stability ~[color=red][i][u][b]STOPPED RESETS[/b][/u][/i][/color] ~Much better economy
[img]http://i36.tinypic.com/2ivjxfp.png[/img] [img]http://i36.tinypic.com/15gxjbp.png[/img] [img]http://img404.imageshack.us/img404/7904/bandosreward.png[/img] [img]http://img294.imageshack.us/img294/4414/ba1.png[/img] [img]http://img689.imageshack.us/img689/6706/ba2.png[/img] [img]http://img29.imageshack.us/img29/2308/ba3.png[/img] [img]http://img22.imageshack.us/img22/4039/ds4r.png[/img]
LINK: puu.sh/8vovr.rar [b]PLEASE NOTE THAT MY CUSTOM CLIENT IS NOT AVAILABLE FOR DOWNLOAD[/b]
